name: Crispy Roasted Chicken
steps: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Rub chicken with oil and herbs.', 'Place chicken in a roasting pan.', 'Roast for 60 minutes or until golden.']

name: Quick Banana Smoothie
steps: ['Peel the banana and chop roughly.', 'Place banana, milk, and honey into a blender.', 'Blend on high speed until smooth.']

name: Simple Tomato Pasta
steps: ['Boil water in a large pot.', 'Add pasta and cook for 10 minutes.', 'Drain water.', 'Mix pasta with tomato sauce and serve.']

name: Microwave Mug Cake
steps: ['Mix flour, sugar, and cocoa in a mug.', 'Stir in milk and oil.', 'Microwave on high for 90 seconds.']

name: Fresh Greek Salad
steps: ['Chop cucumbers and tomatoes.', 'Slice the onion.', 'Toss everything in a bowl with olives and feta cheese.']

name: Pan-Seared Lemon Chicken
steps: ['Pat chicken breasts dry and season with salt and pepper.', 'Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.', 'Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until golden.', 'Squeeze fresh lemon juice over chicken before serving.']

name: Classic Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: ['Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.', 'Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.', 'Stir-fry vegetables for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.', 'Add soy sauce and toss to coat.']

name: Hearty Beef Stew
steps: ['Brown the beef chunks in a large pot.', 'Add potatoes, carrots, and broth.', 'Simmer on low heat for 2 hours until beef is tender.']

name: Green Detox Smoothie
steps: ['Add spinach, apple, and water to a blender.', 'Blend on high until completely smooth.']

name: No-Bake Energy Balls
steps: ['Mix oats, peanut butter, and honey in a bowl.', 'Roll into small balls with your hands.', 'Refrigerate for 30 minutes to set.']

name: Classic Pancakes
steps: ['Mix flour, milk, egg, and baking powder in a bowl.', 'Heat butter in a non-stick pan.', 'Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.', 'Flip and cook until golden.']

name: Avocado Toast with Egg
steps: ['Toast the bread slice.', 'Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.', 'Fry an egg in a small pan.', 'Assemble toast with avocado and egg on top.']

name: Spicy Garlic Shrimp
steps: ['Heat olive oil and butter in a pan.', 'Add garlic and chili flakes, sauté for 1 minute.', 'Add shrimp and cook for 3-4 minutes until pink.']

name: Baked Potato Wedges
steps: ['Preheat oven to 425 degrees.', 'Cut potatoes into wedges and toss with oil and spices.', 'Bake on a sheet for 30-35 minutes until crispy.']

name: Berry Yogurt Parfait
steps: ['Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.', 'Repeat layers and serve immediately.']

name: Creamy Mushroom Soup
steps: ['Sauté chopped onions and mushrooms in butter.', 'Add broth and simmer for 15 minutes.', 'Stir in cream and heat through.', 'Blend if smooth texture is desired (optional).']

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: ['Cook chicken breast in a pan until done.', 'Chop lettuce and place in a bowl.', 'Slice chicken and add to bowl with croutons and parmesan.', 'Toss with Caesar dressing.']

name: Banana Bread
steps: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees.', 'Mash bananas and mix with melted butter, sugar, and egg.', 'Stir in flour and baking soda.', 'Bake in a loaf pan for 50-60 minutes.']

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: ['Butter one side of each bread slice.', 'Place cheese between slices (butter side out).', 'Fry in a pan until golden and cheese is melted.']

name: Veggie Omelet
steps: ['Whisk eggs with salt and pepper.', 'Sauté diced peppers and spinach in a pan.', 'Pour eggs over veggies and cook until set.']

name: Rice and Beans
steps: ['Cook rice according to package instructions.', 'In a separate pot, simmer beans with cumin and garlic.', 'Serve beans over rice.']

name: Pasta Aglio e Olio
steps: ['Boil pasta in salted water.', 'Sauté sliced garlic and chili flakes in generous amount of olive oil.', 'Toss cooked pasta with the garlic oil and parsley.']

name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
steps: ['Drain tuna and mix with mayonnaise and chopped celery.', 'Season with salt and pepper.', 'Spread on bread slices and serve.']

name: Beef Stir Fry Noodles
steps: ['Cook noodles and drain.', 'Stir-fry beef strips in a wok on high heat.', 'Add vegetables and sauce.', 'Toss in noodles and mix well.']

name: Homemade Hummus
steps: ['Combine chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic in a food processor or blender.', 'Blend until smooth, adding water if needed.', 'Drizzle with olive oil to serve.']

name: Fried Rice
steps: ['Heat oil in a wok.', 'Scramble eggs and remove.', 'Fry onions, peas, and carrots.', 'Add cooked rice, soy sauce, and eggs back in. Mix well.']

name: Caprese Skewers
steps: ['Thread a cherry tomato, basil leaf, and mozzarella ball onto a toothpick.', 'Drizzle with balsamic glaze.']

name: Guacamole
steps: ['Mash ripe avocados in a bowl.', 'Stir in chopped onion, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.']

name: Oven Roasted Salmon
steps: ['Preheat oven to 400 degrees.', 'Place salmon on foil, rub with oil and lemon slices.', 'Bake for 12-15 minutes until flaky.']

name: Chocolate Milkshake
steps: ['Combine ice cream, milk, and chocolate syrup in a blender.', 'Blend until smooth and frothy.']
